spec:
We need to protect the triggerRecurringTask method in SchedulerResource by requiring a role
The required role should be set dynamically by the qaurkus application using the scheduler-quarkus library
We can acheive this by setting the role to use in the application.yaml file with a property called incept5.scheduler.api.roles-allowed and one or more roles as the value
for example: 
incept5 
    :scheduler
        :api
            :roles-allowed
                - platform_admin
commitMessage: Add dynamic role-based security for scheduler API endpoints
